sourcesContent:
import React, {useState, useEffect, useRef} from "react" import './CharityItem.scss' import Navbar from "./Navbar"; import SideBar from "./SideBar"; import { BsStars } from 'react-icons/bs' import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useInView } from 'react-intersection-observer'; import { FiMail } from "react-icons/fi"; const Circle = ({score, color}) => { const radius = 45; const circumference = 2 * Math.PI * radius; // const offset = ((100 - score) / 100) * circumference; const offset = (score / 100) * circumference; return ( ); } export default function CharityItem({index, charityid, title, location, category, size, isInternational, total, excess, score, url}) { const [selected, setSelected] = useState(false) const [expanded, setExpanded] = useState(false) function ringColor(category) { switch (category) { case 'Human': return 'rgb(83, 138, 190)' case 'Environment': return 'rgb(48, 162, 97)' case 'Animals': return 'rgb(122, 188, 69)' case 'Healthcare': return 'rgb(198, 83, 93)' case 'Education': return 'rgb(200, 153, 35)' case 'Research': return 'rgb(63, 159, 152)' case 'Community': return 'rgb(139, 117, 98)' default: return '#6a6a6a' } } function handleExpand() { if (!selected && !expanded) { setExpanded(true) } setSelected(!selected) } return (
handleExpand()}>

{title}

{location}

Total Contributions: $2,163,713

Fundraising Expenses: $869,356

Net Assets: $724,930

Other Revenue: $813,713

Program Expenses: $6,532,032

Administrative Expences: $3,713,230

Excess/Deficit: -$32,032

Admin Expense Ratio: 0.08

Organization Focus:{' '} Diseases, Disorder, and Disabilities

{`${category==='Human'?'Human Rights & Services': (category==='Research')?'Research & Public Policy': (category === "Community")?'Community Development':category}`}

{`${size}-Sized`}

{(isInternational)&&

International

}

{`${parseFloat(score).toFixed(1)}`}

) }
